verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> determined שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> for the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> and an house לְמַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> for his kingdom

וַיִּסְפֹּ֨ר <S%H5608><s%> told out שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> threescore and ten אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men סַבָּ֔ל <S%H5449><s%> to bear burdens וּשְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he חֹצֵ֣ב <S%H2672><s%> to hew בָּהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain וּמְנַצְּחִ֣ים <S%H5329><s%> to oversee עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חוּרָ֥ם <S%H2361><s%> to Huram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king צֹ֖ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> As thou didst deal עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> with David אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father וַתִּֽשְׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> and didst send ל֣וֹ אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> him cedars לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> to build ל֥וֹ בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell בּֽוֹ׃

הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I am בֽוֹנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> Behold I build בַּ֜יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֣ם ׀ <S%H8034><s%> to the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהָ֗י <S%H430><s%> my God לְהַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> to dedicate ל֡וֹ לְהַקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> [it] to him [and] to burn לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before קְטֹֽרֶת־ <S%H7004><s%> incense סַמִּים֩ <S%H5561><s%> him sweet וּמַעֲרֶ֨כֶת <S%H4635><s%> shewbread תָּמִ֤יד <S%H8548><s%> and for the continual וְעֹלוֹת֙ <S%H5930><s%> and for the burnt offerings לַבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning וְלָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and evening לַשַּׁבָּתוֹת֙ <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbaths וְלֶ֣חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> and on the new moons וּֽלְמוֹעֲדֵ֖י <S%H4150><s%> and on the solemn feasts יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> This [is an ordinance] for ever זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> to Israel

וְהַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> And the house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am בוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> which I build גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for great אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> [is] our God מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> above all gods

וּמִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who יַעֲצָר־ <S%H6113><s%> be able כֹּ֙חַ֙ <S%H3581><s%> ability לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> to build ל֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <S%H8064><s%> seeing the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֥י <S%H8064><s%> and heaven הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heavens לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְכַלְכְּלֻ֑הוּ <S%H3557><s%> cannot contain וּמִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> should אֶבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> him? who [am] I then that I should build לּ֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> save only לְהַקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> to burn sacrifice לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְֽׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> Send לִ֣י אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> me now therefore a man חָכָ֡ם <S%H2450><s%> cunning לַעֲשׂוֹת֩ <S%H6213><s%> to work בַּזָּהָ֨ב <S%H2091><s%> in gold וּבַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and in silver וּבַנְּחֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and in brass וּבַבַּרְזֶ֗ל <S%H1270><s%> and in iron וּבָֽאַרְגְּוָן֙ <S%H710><s%> and in purple וְכַרְמִ֣יל <S%H3758><s%> and crimson וּתְכֵ֔לֶת <S%H8504><s%> and blue וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> and that can skill לְפַתֵּ֣חַ <S%H6605><s%> to make פִּתּוּחִ֑ים <S%H6603><s%> engravings עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> have הַֽחֲכָמִ֗ים <S%H2450><s%> with the cunning men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom עִמִּי֙ <S%H5973><s%> have בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> that [are] with me in Judah וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֵכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> did provide דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> whom David אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> my father

וּֽשְׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> Send לִי֩ עֲצֵ֨י <S%H6086><s%> trees אֲרָזִ֜ים <S%H730><s%> me also cedar בְּרוֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H1265><s%> fir trees וְאַלְגּוּמִּים֮ <S%H418><s%> and algum trees מֵֽהַלְּבָנוֹן֒ <S%H3844><s%> out of Lebanon כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> for I know אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> your עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> that thy servants יֽוֹדְעִ֔ים <S%H3045><s%> can skill לִכְר֖וֹת <S%H3772><s%> to cut עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> timber לְבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> in Lebanon וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and indeed עֲבָדַ֖י <S%H5650><s%> and behold my servants עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> [shall be] with thy servants

וּלְהָכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> Even to prepare לִ֛י עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> me timber לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> for the house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am בוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> which I am about to build גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great וְהַפְלֵֽא׃ <S%H6381><s%> [shall be] wonderful

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold לַֽחֹטְבִ֣ים ׀ <S%H2404><s%> the hewers לְֽכֹרְתֵ֣י ׀ <S%H3772><s%> that cut הָעֵצִ֡ים <S%H6086><s%> timber נָתַתִּי֩ <S%H5414><s%> And behold I will give חִטִּ֨ים ׀ <S%H2406><s%> wheat מַכּ֜וֹת <S%H4347><s%> of beaten לַעֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> to thy servants כֹּרִים֙ <S%H3734><s%> measures עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׂעֹרִ֕ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley כֹּרִ֖ים <S%H3734><s%> measures עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְיַ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine בַּתִּים֙ <S%H1324><s%> baths עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֶׁ֕מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil בַּתִּ֖ים <S%H1324><s%> baths עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered חוּרָ֤ם <S%H2361><s%> Then Huram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king צֹר֙ <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre בִּכְתָ֔ב <S%H3791><s%> in writing וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> which he sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בְּאַהֲבַ֤ת <S%H160><s%> hath loved יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Because the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people נְתָנְךָ֥ <S%H5414><s%> he hath made עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> thee king

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said חוּרָם֒ <S%H2361><s%> Huram בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> moreover Blessed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> who hath given לְדָוִ֨יד <S%H1732><s%> to David הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> a wise יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> endued שֵׂ֣כֶל <S%H7922><s%> with prudence וּבִינָ֔ה <S%H998><s%> and understanding אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> that might build בַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> an house לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD וּבַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> and an house לְמַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> for his kingdom

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שָׁלַ֧חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> And now I have sent אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man חָכָ֛ם <S%H2450><s%> a cunning יוֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> endued בִּינָ֖ה <S%H998><s%> with understanding לְחוּרָ֥ם <S%H2361><s%> of Huram אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> my father's

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son אִשָּׁ֞ה <S%H802><s%> of a woman מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters דָּ֗ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan וְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> and his father אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> [was] a man צֹרִ֡י <S%H6876><s%> of Tyre יוֹדֵ֡עַ <S%H3045><s%> skilful לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to work בַּזָּֽהָב־ <S%H2091><s%> in gold וּ֠בַכֶּסֶף <S%H3701><s%> and in silver בַּנְּחֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> in brass בַּבַּרְזֶ֜ל <S%H1270><s%> in iron בָּאֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> in stone וּבָעֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> and in timber בָּאַרְגָּמָ֤ן <S%H713><s%> in purple בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> in blue וּבַבּ֣וּץ <S%H948><s%> and in fine linen וּבַכַּרְמִ֔יל <S%H3758><s%> and in crimson וּלְפַתֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H6605><s%> also to grave כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פִּתּ֔וּחַ <S%H6603><s%> any manner of graving וְלַחְשֹׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> and to find out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מַחֲשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H4284><s%> every device אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which יִנָּֽתֶן־ <S%H5414><s%> which shall be put לוֹ֙ עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חֲכָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H2450><s%> to him with thy cunning men וְֽחַכְמֵ֔י <S%H2450><s%> and with the cunning men אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> of my lord דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thy father

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now הַחִטִּ֨ים <S%H2406><s%> Now therefore the wheat וְהַשְּׂעֹרִ֜ים <S%H8184><s%> and the barley הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> the oil וְהַיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> and the wine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> hath spoken אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> which my lord יִשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> of let him send לַעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants
